akei nih skama mik, unte wait ƕamma galaubida, jah gatraua þammei mahteigs ist þata anafilh mein fastan in jainana dag.
2TIM 1.13 frisaht habands hailaize waurde, þoei at mis hausides in galaubeinai jah frijaþwai in Xristau Iesu, 2TIM 1.14 þata godo anafilh fastai þairh ahman weihana saei bauiþ in uns.
2TIM 1.15 waist þatei afwandidedun sik af mis allai þaiei sind in Asiai, þizeei ist Fwgailus jah Hairmaugaineis.
2TIM 1.16 gibai armaion frauja Auneiseifauraus garda, unte ufta mik anaþrafstida jah naudibandjo meinaizo ni skamaida sik; 2TIM 1.17 ak qimands in Rumai usdaudo sokida mik jah bigat.
2TIM 1.18 gibai frauja imma bigitan armahairtein at fraujin in jainamma daga;
jah ƕan filu in Aifaison andbahtida mis, waila þu kant.

2TIM 2.1 þu nu, barn mein waliso, inswinþei þuk in anstai þizai in Xristau Iesu, 2TIM 2.2 jah þoei hausides at mis þairh managa weitwodja þo anafilh triggwaim mannam, þaiei wairþai sijaina jah anþarans laisjan.
2TIM 2.3 þu nu arbaidei swe gods gadrauhts Xristaus Iesuis.
2TIM 2.4 ni ainshun drauhtinonds fraujin dugawindiþ sik gawaurkjam þizos aldais, ei galeikai þammei drauhtinoþ.
2TIM 2.5 jah þan jabai haifsteiþ ƕas, ni weipada, niba witodeigo brikiþ.
2TIM 2.6 arbaidjands airþos waurstwja skal frumist akrane andniman.
2TIM 2.7 fraþei þatei qiþa;
gibiþ auk þus frauja fraþi us allaim.
2TIM 2.8 Gamuneis Xristu Iesu urrisanana us dauþaim us fraiwa Daweidis bi aiwaggeljon meinai, 2TIM 2.9 in þizaiei arbaidja und bandjos swe ubiltojis;
akei waurd gudis nist gabundan.
2TIM 2.10 inuh þis all gaþula bi þans gawalidans, ei jah þai ganist gatilona, sei ist in Xristau Iesu miþ wulþau aiweinamma.
2TIM 2.11 triggw þata waurd:
jabai miþgadauþnodedum, jah miþlibam;
2TIM 2.12 jabai gaþulam, jah miþþiudanom;
jabai afaikam, jah is afaikiþ uns;
2TIM 2.13 jabai ni galaubjam, jains triggws wisiþ;
afaikan sik silban ni mag.
2TIM 2.14 þizei gamaudei, weitwodjands in andwairþja fraujins;
waurdam weihan du ni waihtai daug, niba uswalteinai þaim hausjondam.
2TIM 2.15 usdaudei þuk silban gakusanana usgiban guda waurstwjan unaiwiskana, raihtaba raidjandan waurd sunjos.
2TIM 2.16 iþ þo dwalona usweihona lausawaurdja biwandei;
unte filu gaggand du afgudein, 2TIM 2.17 jah waurd ize swe gund wuliþ;
þizeei ist Wmainaius jah Filetus, 2TIM 2.18 þaiei bi sunjai uswissai usmetun, qiþandans usstass ju waurþana, jah galaubein sumaize uswaltidedun.
2TIM 2.19 aþþan tulgus grunduwaddjus gudis standiþ, habands sigljo þata: kunþa frauja þans þaiei sind is, jah: afstandai af unselein ƕazuh saei namnjai namo fraujins.
2TIM 2.20 aþþan in mikilamma garda ni sind þatainei kasa gulþeina jah silubreina, ak jah triweina jah digana, jah suma du sweraim, sum-uþ-þan du unsweraim.
...2TIM 2.21 du allamma waurstwe godaize gamanwiþ.
2TIM 2.22 aþþan juggans lustuns þliuh;
iþ laistei garaihtein, galaubein, frijaþwa, gawairþi miþ þaim bidai anahaitandam fraujan us hrainjamma hairtin.
2TIM 2.23 iþ þos dwalons jah untalons soknins biwandei, witands þatei gabairand sakjons.

2TIM 2.24 iþ skalks fraujins ni skal sakan, ak qairrus wisan wiþra allans, laiseigs, usþulands, 2TIM 2.25 in qairrein talzjands þans andstandandans, niu ƕan gibai im guþ idreiga du ufkunþja sunjos, 2TIM 2.26 jah usskarjaindau us unhulþins wruggon, fram þammei gafahanai habanda afar is wiljin.

2TIM 3.1 Aþþan þata kunneis ei in spedistaim dagam atgaggand jera sleidja, 2TIM 3.2 jah wairþand mannans sik frijondans, faihugairnai, bihaitjans, hauhhairtai, wajamerjandans, fadreinam ungaƕairbai, launawargos, unairknans, 2TIM 3.3 unhunslagai, unmildjai, fairinondans, ungahabandans sik, unmanarigwai, unseljai, 2TIM 3.4 fralewjandans, untilamalskai, ufbaulidai, frijondans wiljan seinana mais þau guþ, 2TIM 3.5 habandans hiwi gagudeins, iþ maht izos inwidandans;
